-%0Aclass Leao(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, name: str):%0A        super(). __init__(name)%0A%0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        print(%22WRAAAAAAU%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22O leao %C3%A9 o rei da floresta!!%22)%0A%0Aclass Elefante(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, name: str):%0A        super().__init__(name)%0A%0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        print(%22PRRRRRR (SOM DA TROMBA)%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22O elefante %C3%A9 gigantesco!!%22)%0A%0Aclass Cobra(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, name: str):%0A        super().__init__(name)%0A%0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        print(%22Sssssss...%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22A cobra %C3%A9 um animal venenoso!!!%22)%0A%0A%0Adef apresentar(animal = Animal):%0A    animal.apresentar_nome()%0A    animal.fazer_som()%0A    animal.mover()%0A    print(%22Tipo do animal:%22, type(animal).__name__)%0A    print(%22-%22 * 30)%0A%0A%0Aif __name__ == %22__main__%22:%0A    animais = %5B%0A        Leao(%22Mufasa%22),%0A        Elefante(%22Elly%22),%0A        Cobra(%22Nagini%22)%0A    %5D%0A    for a in animais:%0A        apresentar(a)%0A%0A
